author: Rodney Dunigan
title: chevron-right
text: {p}A Columbus family who had their world torn apart has been forced to say goodbye to a father viciously beaten outside of a south side shopping center.{ }{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://www.orwoodyard.com/obituaries/Donald-E-Smith-Jr?obId=30164051\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://www.orwoodyard.com/obituaries/Donald-E-Smith-Jr?obId=30164051\"}Funeral services{/a} for Donnie Smith are set for Thursday night.{br}{/p}{p}ABC 6 has been {a href=\"https://abc6onyourside.com/news/local/south-columbus-father-remembered-after-losing-his-life-following-brutal-attack-outside-supermarket\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://abc6onyourside.com/news/local/south-columbus-father-remembered-after-losing-his-life-following-brutal-attack-outside-supermarket\"}following this investigation{/a} from the very start, speaking with family and friends as they try to work through the pain.{br}{/p}{p}Smith's partner, Nicole Evans, told ABC 6 that she is broken knowing the loving dad won't get to see his 15-year-old son and 6-year old daughter grow up.{br}{/p}{blockquote}Donny was an amazing person; he was a great father, he loved his babies, he loved his kids. They were his world,‚Äù Evans said.{/blockquote}{h2}RELATED |{ }{a href=\"https://abc6onyourside.com/news/local/two-teens-face-murder-charges-in-connection-with-south-columbus-deadly-kroger-assault\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://abc6onyourside.com/news/local/two-teens-face-murder-charges-in-connection-with-south-columbus-deadly-kroger-assault\"}Teens face murder charges in connection with south Columbus deadly Kroger assault{/a}{/h2}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-alt=\"WSYX\" data-caption=\"WSYX\" data-duration=\"158.592\" data-title=\"Dunigan%20NOON\" data-embed-type=\"video\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Witnesses told ABC 6 that Smith was viciously beaten outside of a south side shopping center. He lost his life days later.{br}{/p}{p}The youngest of the three suspects who were arrested is now facing murder charges as a 17-year old. He will be back in front of a judge in January of 2024. We could learn then if he will be tried as an adult in the case.{/p}{p}18-year-old Dionta Hughes and 19-year-old Jamarion Bennett {a href=\"https://abc6onyourside.com/news/local/two-teens-face-murder-charges-in-connection-with-south-columbus-deadly-kroger-assault\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://abc6onyourside.com/news/local/two-teens-face-murder-charges-in-connection-with-south-columbus-deadly-kroger-assault\"}are being held{/a} on a bond of $1 million each.{/p}{p}As Evans prepares herself and her children for Donnie Smith's services, she chooses to focus on the man he was, and not how he lost his life.{br}
